titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Costa Rica
Costa Rica

div.head: Legislation
div.p: A National Archives law dictates that permanent records of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs be delivered to the National Archives once they are no longer in use. There is not yet a freedom of information law.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: Curridabat, San José. Del Centro Comercial Plaza del Sol.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Avenida 7-9, Calle 11-13 San José.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write or visit the National Archives to inquire about access to diplomatic records.
